title: Trade my T205 Speaker for your T202 Speaker, Wood, Speaker Rounding Third
author: Belfast1933

posts.post_title: Trade my T205 Speaker for your T202 Speaker, Wood, Speaker Rounding Third
posts.post_content:
I haven’t had much luck trying this before, but am willing to try this again!  

I am looking to try and build $$ for another purchase so I am looking to trade my T205 Tris Speaker (SGC 4, see below) for a nicely centered T202 Speaker, Wood, Speaker Rounding Third in a grade 2-4 plus cash to me.

I have posted elsewhere interest in simply buying a T202 of this card above and would still do so… but I thought I may put the trade idea out here as well.  Cast a wide net, as they say

Thx for looking…

Jeff
